2.content:
def tongues(code):
    vowels = 'aiyeou'
    consonants = 'bkxznhdcwgpvjqtsrlmf'
    vowels_upper = vowels.upper()
    consonants_upper = consonants.upper()
    vowels_trans = vowels[3:] + vowels[:3]
    consonants_trans = consonants[10:] + consonants[:10]
    vowels_trans_upper = vowels_upper[3:] + vowels_upper[:3]
    consonants_trans_upper = consonants_upper[10:] + consonants_upper[:10]
    decode_table = str.maketrans(vowels + vowels_upper + consonants + consonants_upper, 
                                 vowels_trans + vowels_trans_upper + consonants_trans + consonants_trans_upper)
    return code.translate(decode_table)

3.content:
def tongues(code):
    vowels = 'aiyeou'
    consonants = 'bkxznhdcwgpvjqtsrlmf'
    vowels_upper = vowels.upper()
    consonants_upper = consonants.upper()
    vowels_trans = vowels[3:] + vowels[:3]
    consonants_trans = consonants[10:] + consonants[:10]
    vowels_trans_upper = vowels_upper[3:] + vowels_upper[:3]
    consonants_trans_upper = consonants_upper[10:] + consonants_upper[:10]
    decode_table = str.maketrans(vowels + vowels_upper + consonants + consonants_upper, 
                                 vowels_trans + vowels_trans_upper + consonants_trans + consonants_trans_upper)
    return code.translate(decode_table)
